name: MLTrainingSession
desc: The current state of a model’s asynchronous training session.

items.name: enum MLPhase
items.desc: The possible states of a training session.

items.name: var iteration: Int
items.desc: The iteration number of a training session’s phase.

items.name: var checkpoints: [MLCheckpoint]
items.desc: An array of checkpoints the training session has created so far.

items.name: func removeCheckpoints((MLCheckpoint) -> Bool)
items.desc: Removes the checkpoints that satisfy your closure from the training session.

items.name: func reuseExtractedFeatures(from: MLTrainingSession<Task>)
items.desc: Uses the features another session has already extracted from its dataset.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The time when you created this training session.

items.name: let parameters: MLTrainingSessionParameters
items.desc: The parameters you used to create the training session.
